text: The French Chess Federation (French : Fédération Française des Echecs – FFE) is the national organization for chess in France. The president is Diego Salazar, the vice-president is Christophe Leroy and the treasurer is Stéphane Reyreau. The headquarters of the French Chess Federation is Saint-Quentin-en- Yvelines, near Paris. The French federation was founded in 1933. == Related pages == * French Chess Championship == Other websites == * Official Website Category:Chess organizations Category:Sports organizations of France
title: French Chess Federation
